dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially.; Covers North America, Central America, and northern part of South America.; State 2, first issued in 1641, according to Burden; matches description of Dutch text versions appearing in Nieuwen atlas editions 1645, '47, '52, '53, and '58.; Includes text and ill.
